original_text: And you will hear of wars and rumors of wars. See that you are not alarmed, for this must take place, but the end is not yet.
korean_text: 난리와 난리 소문을 듣겠으나 너희는 삼가 두려워하지 말라 이런 일이 있어야 하되 아직 끝은 아니니라

sentences.original_text: And you will hear of wars and rumors of wars.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 전쟁과 전쟁의 소문을 듣게 될 것이다.

sentences.original_text: See that you are not alarmed
but the end is not yet.
